name: Every Web is a Home
description:
Home is where you build it. A place to live, sleep and eat. 

A safe place... BUT NOT FOR YOUR DINNER! 

Build your web, bugs are coming in moments! Maybe you can build a home that can catch enough food? 

Movement: 

  • Analog stick (Controller), WASD (Keyboard)

Jump + Make web: 

  • X (PS controller), A (XBox controller), Space (Keyboard)

Credits: 

💣💣💣 Team

  • Art / UI / Menus: Inês Merino, Eduardo Correia
  • Music / SFX: Jualine Marubayashi
  • Programming: Henrique Basto, Miguel Mendes, Rui Leixo

This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2019. 

Here's the link to our team's entry:

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/every-web-home
